result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Romeo J Perez

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Romeo J Perez appeared by video.  Attorney Haley E Wentz appeared by video for Romeo J Perez.  Attorney Grace M. Gall appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE. Case in court for scheduling conference.  Defense requests a status date.  Court set date as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Status conference scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signed and Filed: No Contact/No Firearms Order.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Crivello.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Shelton, Br. 40.

Defendant Romeo J Perez in court with Attorney Haley E Wentz; both appear by video.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 40, Judge Shelton. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 40.  Scheduling conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver.  Received and Filed.  nk
Request for Substitution of Judge.  Received and Filed.  nk
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel.  Received and Filed.  nk
Received and Filed:  Proposed No Contact Order.

ADDRESS INFO for Romeo J Perez
Current: 3714 East Plankinton Avenue, Cudahy, WI 53110   (Effective: 08-02-2022)
Prior: 3706 East Plankinton Avenue, Cudahy, WI 53110

Court ordered no contact with Dunhams Discount Sports, RT, or JLD.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

$200 Cash bail that was previously posted to remain.
No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Romeo J Perez in court with attorney David Thomas Conley.  Katrina Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Crivello, Branch 36.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 8/5/22 @ 2:30p
